note: Pair Pre-Create Fix - addLiquidityETH now works from contracts by pre-creating LP pair via factory.createPair() before adding liquidity. Gas for addLiquidity increased to ~2.3M.

code: Added factory.createPair() call before addLiquidityETH in Fairlaunch._addLiquidity()
Updated all frontend references to use new factory address
changes.impact: Fixes DexAddLiquidityCallFailed revert on BSC Testnet. Gas for adminAddLiquidity: ~280K â†’ ~2.3M (first-time pair creation)
